title: The Calm before the Carnage: How I’m Preparing for the UCI Esports World Championships
content:
Velo contributor Zach Nehr represents Team USA at the MyWhoosh Eworlds this weekend. He takes us through the weigh-ins and warm-ups of race week.

Read the full article at The Calm before the Carnage: How I’m Preparing for the UCI Esports World Championships on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
